headline: Polish manufacturing sector contracts sharply in June, PMI shows
summary: Poland's manufacturing sectorcontracted sharply in June, with new orders and output decliningat the fastest rate in more than 2-1/2 years, the latest PMIdata from S&P Global showed on Tuesday. ...
